-- Seconds In Day = 86400

--------------------

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_impact_categories;

CREATE TABLE migration_impact_categories AS (

with temp as
(select 
id,
uuid() newImpactTimespanId,
description,
(FRAME_END_HOURS * 3600) +
(FRAME_END_DAYS * 86400) +
(FRAME_END_WEEKS * 86400 * 7) +
(FRAME_END_MONTHS * 86400 * 30) seconds
 from t_recovery_time_objective)

select t.*,
case when unit = 'days' then seconds DIV (3600 * 24) else
    case when unit = 'hours' then seconds DIV 3600 else 100 end end timespanDuration,
case when unit = 'days' then '0cab3e34-0f19-4cc6-b580-cc8dc70af2d5' else
    case when unit = 'hours' then '41bb6fc1-df74-42b5-8f41-e55e5a4570ed' else '9372a9f2-4391-4a8b-80ec-9c6150a48f23' end end timespanDurationUnitId
 from
(select id, newImpactTimespanId, description, seconds,
IF ((seconds / 86400) != CONVERT(seconds / 86400, UNSIGNED), 'hours', 'days') unit
 from temp
 UNION
 select
 -1,
 uuid() newImpactTimespanId,
 (select CONCAT(temp.description, ' +')
 from temp
 where seconds = (select max(seconds) from temp)) description,
  3153600000 seconds,
  'years' unit) t
);
 
 ----------------------

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_portalProcess_RTO;

CREATE TABLE migration_portalProcess_RTO AS
( select
  oi.id,
  oi.FUNCTION_ID,
  oi.note,
  oi.outage_impact_id, -- ?
  oi.type_id,
  oi.rto_id,
  rto.newImpactTimespanId,
  oit.name impactCategoryTypeName,
  rto.description,
  rto.seconds,
  strategyRTOs.id startegyRTOId,
  strategyRTOs.description startegyRTODescription,
  strategyRTOs.seconds startegyRTOSeconds,
  strategyRTOs.newImpactTimespanId startegyNewImpactTimespanId
  from t_detailed_outage_impact oi
 join t_detailed_outage_impact_type oit on oi.type_id = oit.id
 join migration_impact_categories rto on rto.id = oi.rto_id
 left join (select * from
(select 
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY functStrategy.FUNCTION_ID ORDER BY rto.seconds) rn,
functStrategy.FUNCTION_ID,
rto.id,
rto.seconds,
rto.description,
rto.newImpactTimespanId
 from 
T_BIA_MATRIX_FUNCTION_ENTRY functStrategy
left join migration_impact_categories rto on rto.id = functStrategy.rto_id
order by FUNCTION_ID) minRTOs
where rn = 1) strategyRTOs on strategyRTOs.FUNCTION_ID = oi.FUNCTION_ID);
